content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Baihu Li from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in New York. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Baihu Li from China

content: Thank you for your interest in my apartment, Baihu Li. Based on the size and location of the apartment, I am looking for a rental price of 1000 Euros per month. Is this within your budget?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I agree to the price of 900 Euros per month.
name: Baihu Li from China

content: Thank you for agreeing to my rental price of 900 Euros per month, Baihu Li. I appreciate your willingness to work with me and I look forward to having you as my tenant.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I agree to the price of 850 Euros per month.
Please let me know if there are any other terms or conditions that I need to be aware of.
Thank you for your time.

Best regards,
Baihu Li

P.S. I am a student and I want to be on good terms with my landlord.
name: Baihu Li from China

content: Thank you for your willingness to negotiate and agreeing to the rental price of 850 Euros per month, Baihu Li. As your landlord, I appreciate your commitment to being a good tenant and I am happy to have you as my tenant. In terms of terms and conditions, I would like to clarify that the rental price is due on the 1st day of each month and any late payments will incur a penalty. Additionally, I would like to have access to your apartment to conduct regular inspections to ensure that it is being maintained in a clean and respectful manner. Please let me know if you have any questions or concerns about these terms.
name: Heinrich Heine
